entries.title: Biden’s "Diplomacy" in Yemen Means Taking Saudi Arabia’s Side — and Could Spark All-Out War
entries.description:
The White House said Bernie Sanders’s war powers resolution would prolong the war, but that’s what its own efforts are doing.

The post Biden’s “Diplomacy” in Yemen Means Taking Saudi Arabia’s Side — and Could Spark All-Out War appeared first on The Intercept.

entries.title: What the United States Owes Afghan Women
entries.description:
To justify its 20-year war, the U.S. said it cared about the Afghan people. Now Congress is abandoning those seeking to escape Taliban rule.

The post What the United States Owes Afghan Women appeared first on The Intercept.
